summary: The bill, the Bureau of Prisons Earnings Now Act of 2025 (BOPEN Act of 2025), concerns the appropriation of funds for the payment of salaries and expenses for staff of the Bureau of Prisons.  It specifies that during periods without full-year appropriations for fiscal years 2026 or 2027, necessary funds will be provided from the Treasury.  However, it excludes officers requiring Presidential appointment with Senate consent.
